entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
